personal.name: Mohammed Aymaan
personal.title: Software Development Engineer
personal.summary: Results-driven App Developer at CoffeeCodes with a proven track record of delivering four real-time applications for real clients. Experienced in leading app development teams and managing interns while ensuring high-quality deliverables. Adept at balancing work and college commitments, demonstrating strong time management, leadership, and problem-solving skills. Passionate about building scalable, efficient, and user-centric applications in fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Senior App Developer
experience.description:
Lead the app development team, ensuring timely project execution and delivery.
	•	Manage and mentor interns, providing guidance on best practices and technical skills.
	•	Develop and deploy real-time applications for clients, ensuring high performance and scalability.
	•	Balance multiple responsibilities by effectively managing work and college commitments.
	•	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, build, and optimize user-centric applications.
	•	Maintain high coding standards, conduct code reviews, and implement industry best practices.

skills: •	Programming Languages: Dart (Flutter), JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Rust
•	Mobile App Development: Flutter, React Native
•	Backend Development: Node.js, Express.js, Gin, Fiber
•	Database Management: PostgreSQL, Firebase, Redis, SQLite
•	API Development: REST, gRPC, GraphQL, WebSockets
•	Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Docker, Firebase, CI/CD Pipelines
•	Software Methodologies: Agile, Test-Driven Development (TDD), Microservices Architecture

•	Project Management & Deadline Handling
	•	Problem-Solving & Critical Thinking
	•	Effective Communication & Collaboration
	•	Time Management & Multitasking

projects.name: Aicraft - AI Integration SDK
projects.description: Aicraft is a CrewAI-inspired framework for Golang, featuring an agent-manager system for building AI-driven workflows. It provides seamless integration with multiple generative AI models and optimizations for efficient API usage.

projects.name: Food Transparency System
projects.description: A blockchain-based supply chain tracking system for food products. It leverages smart contracts to ensure data integrity and provides a user-friendly interface for stakeholders to verify product origins.

projects.name: Facial Recognition Attendance System
projects.description: A facial recognition-based attendance system using deep learning. It employs computer vision techniques for identity verification and includes anti-spoofing measures for security.

interests: App Development & Software Architecture – Passionate about building scalable and high-performance applications.
